name: Lightbearing Scale-Feather
description: The scaly wings shed by a defeated Radiant Moonfly.  In many local folk tales, those who enter the forbidden ground are frequentlybewitched by these wings and never seen again. Some say this is because themoon, whose illusory magic these butterfly-shaped monsters have harnessed, isprone to inducing madness, while others take it as a warning of theinconstancy and danger of ancient power…
